name: IT201_Project02_BrandonSanchez
description:
Description: Updating my previous Sprint Project with more fun new features! The new features are, a Greeting Message, A Disco Cube that continuously changes colors, ability to Hide said message, a working Clock, being able to Move the Camera, and Music Player.

My users will have a great time painting with all these new fancy features. The users should expect a fun new array of things to do while using my painting app. From listening to music handpicked by me on a newly programmed audio player! As well as look at the actual time on a programmed working clock. A greeting message that is connected to a light-up disco cube that continuously changes colors. The ability to hide that message using the h key. And finally being able to move the camera around as you paint!
